name: Modern Apex Strike Legends FPS
description:
Modern Critical Strike Ops FPS is a 3D FPS build for mobile. Experience action, where fast reflexes and TACTICAL skills are essential to success.
Are you ready for the one of skill-based mobile FPS?

3D First Person Shooter in real-time.
-Singleplayer(with bots)
-Different game mode
-Large Maps
-3 Pistols
-2 Shotgun
-4 Rifles
-2 Sniper-rifles
-Grenades
